alert.note: Alert for Madison (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 02 at 5:57AM CST until March 04 at 12:40PM CST by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 AM CST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Urban area and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected along and near Indian Creek in Madison County. * WHERE...Areas immediately along Indian Creek in western Madison County. * WHEN...Until 945 AM CST. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, along and near Indian Creek in Madison County is occurring. Indian Creek will continue to remain above Flood Stage through mid morning due to excess runoff from earlier rainfall. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 554 AM CST, Excessive rainfall of 2 to 4 inches has caused Indian Creek to rise above Flood Stage. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are possible in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Western Huntsville, Madison, Redstone Arsenal, Triana, Huntsville International Airport and Harvest. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
